page.title: 11BLUE CIRCLE CEMENT.
page.content: This is a national firm its headquarters at Portland House,London It has a {plant}at {Barnstone. {Opened In {1927}it employed 150 people at its most. It produced 70,000 tons of cement each year in 1960's. It changed in 1970 to be mostly a research site with{chemists}and { {geologists.}At present it employs 28 in the {minerals }division,plus some{ {geologists}. It now produces about { {25,000 tons of cement}mostly used by the national coal board to help keep mine walls up and by the steel industry. the{quarries}which are now largely out of use are flooded to form valuable { {fishing ground}.The waste products have made an excellent{wildlife {habitat}which the company has encouraged.
